history.proof: intros x y. hauto drew: off use: pos_opp_lt, Rabs_pos, Ropp_involutive, RRle_abs, Rabs_def2, Rabs_le, Ropp_0 unfold: Rle, Rabs.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : R H : Rabs x <= y The term "triangle_rectangle ?x ?y ?z" has type "0 <= ?z -> ?x² + ?y² <= ?z² -> - ?z <= ?x <= ?z /\\ - ?z <= ?y <= ?z" while it is expected to have type "?A /\\ ?B".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment x, y : R H1 : - y <= x H2 : x <= y The term "triangle_rectangle ?x ?y ?z" has type "0 <= ?z -> ?x² + ?y² <= ?z² -> - ?z <= ?x <= ?z /\\ - ?z <= ?y <= ?z" while it is expected to have type "?A /\\ ?B".
Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

original: intros x y. split. - intros H. apply (proj1 (triangle_rectangle _ _ _) H). - intros [H1 H2]. apply (proj1 (triangle_rectangle _ _ _)). split; auto.
